TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content:
*Titan Logic Core starts melting... Anyway thats normal just sayin'*

What now?.... well i have a bag of Potato chips for this kind of weird situations.

*starts eating them*
*Eats with you*
Well.... *crunch* I think this time travel is boring... *crunch* I wish we were at my home to eat a good Taco.
*gives you a packet of these*

*Accepts them really happy*

My motherland.. on a bite *crunch* Im so happy ;..)

*Apparently Titan is crying... and eating at the same time, Thats weird*

Edited October 2, 2013 by Zaryulenko
then tardis

"Uh, the Engeria is a SOVIET rocket"

*poker face*

"ANYWAY..."

*keeps eating the fries*

Nope i said i was a prototype robot form of a soviet rocket

And... Energia has a different look to me i mean uh... Big booster arms!

but i never said from were i am.... Anyway i prefer my country than being a Rocketeer Robot Master from a random Skaltan region

*instantly remembers the disaster of the first rocketeer Dynamo.... DAMMIT... everyone know you cant launch a whale into space! Or atleast not whitout Jeb*
*Keeps eating*

*Keeps talking about All rocketeer robots for 5 hours.... Stops after our random Time travelling elevator thing gets us back to the present of a parallel universe where Dogs control the world and tacos eat people... Anyway we are still here eating*

*locks the elevator*

*gets a huge store of food from my submarine and lets us eat it together*

*after depleting my first Potato chips stage i hit the stagging and i get fried chicken from Kerbol Fried Chicken*

CHICKEN!!!!!!!

*Starts eating like an pig*

*Eats like a pig along with you*

"If I die, I want to die eating!"

*The first thing is though when I heard "Tardis" : Dr Whooves

Warning : Ponies!

" you mean the 242346443576472nd doctor :P"

(yes, I know the doctor can't live for THAT long )
of course he can he is "THE doctor"

Actualy, the only thing I know for Dr. Who is :

1) The time machine is a police box

2) The daleks are evil and can, in fact, climb stairs

3) Allway watch the wepping angels

4) There's many doctor (or, they are only the same person at defferent time?)

5) They got a cool gadget called "Sonic Screwdriver"
the police box is called a tardis

*After watching that Mars person (Not Just "an alien thing" if you used Sprites of Metal Slug)*

I think i should get a *Suddenly a Giant crate whit an big flashing H* HEVY MACHINGAWN!

*Shoots everywhere and after noticing that is racist againist them stops and burns it whit the power of the TITAN BLAST OFF!*+

Dammit i wasnt supposed to do that......
I take out a magic marker and write "my name is inigo Montoya, you killed my father prepare to die" several times on your face.

*uses the power of the blast off and Part of the Snow Man broken Reactor cover Anti-Magic properties to burn the writing*

Well now im bored again.... can someone entertain me?
hum I could post that song again
"must resist..."
Noooooooooo that song again will burn our souls!!!!!!!!!!

fun fact

this This is the song that never ends.

It just goes on and on my friends.

Some people started singing it not knowing what it was,

And they'll continue singing it forever just because . . .

is the officeal Lyrics

and this

This is the song that doesn't end.

Yes, it goes on and on my friend.

Some people started singing it not knowing what it was,

And they'll continue singing it forever just because . . .

is the one you probably know better (from Lamb Chop's Play-Along)
